name: Tap Tap Swing
description:
Tap Tap Swing is insanely hard but incredibly addictive.

#How to play?
You have to swing the Squarelicious characters as far as you can just like a spider would. Super simple 1 touch controls but make no mistake. Avoid the obstacles and collect the gems on your way to unlocking fantastic new heroes.

#Game Features:
- Free To Play
- Simple 1 Touch Controls
- 2 Difficulty Modes – Easy & Normal
- Beautiful Minimal Art Style
